member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute
member.summary: AddIn package attribute. Use it do annotate an addIn package from your assembly. IMPORTANT: You can have multiple assemblies in your AddIn package, please use AddInPackageAttribute only once per AddIn, not once per assembly!

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: AddIn package attribute constructor. IMPORTANT: You can have multiple assemblies in your AddIn package, please use AddInPackageAttribute only once per package, not once per assembly!
member.param: The name of the add-in package.
Unique ID of the package. This is a GUID in a registry format.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.Name
member.summary: The name of the add-in package.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.ID
member.summary: Unique ID of the package. This is a GUID in registry format.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.Description
member.summary: Package description.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.Version
member.summary: Package version.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.Author
member.summary: Package author.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.Company
member.summary: A company or entity that developed this package.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.Date
member.summary: Packaging date.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.TargetProduct
member.summary: Target product for the add-in. Usually set to 'Server'.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.AddInPackageAttribute.TargetVersion
member.summary: Target product's version. For example, '10.4'.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ArcGISCoCreatableAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: ArcGISCoCreatableAttribute constructor has no parameters.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute
member.summary: Use ServerObjectExtension attribute to annotate main SOE class that implements IServerObjectExtension. An Add-in package can have multiple ServerObjectExtension classes but it is not recommended.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: ServerObjectExtension attribute constructor.
member.param: Type of the server object that this SOE was designed for. Example: 'MapServer'.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.DisplayName
member.summary: SOE display name that you will see in Manager or other admin client.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.Description
member.summary: SOE description.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.DefaultCapabilities
member.summary: Default set of web capabilities in comma-separated list. Subset of AllCapabilities.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.AllCapabilities
member.summary: All web capabilities in a comma-separated list.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.SupportsREST
member.summary: Shows that SOE supports REST API. Default is false.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.SupportsSOAP
member.summary: Shows that SOE supports SOAP API. Default is false.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.Properties
member.summary: SOE properties.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.ServerObjectType
member.summary: Type of the server object that this SOE was designed for. Example: 'MapServer'.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.HasManagerPropertiesConfigurationPane
member.summary: Set this flag to true if you have custom JS widged for the SOE properties pane in Manager.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectExtensionAttribute.SOAPNamespaceURI
member.summary: Sets SOAP namespace URI for the add-in configuration.
member.example:
This example shows how to define SOAP namespace URI for SOE.
[ComVisible(true)] [Guid("ff21a501-5eb9-406a-aab1-29389d25b868")] [ClassInterface(ClassInterfaceType.None)] [ServerObjectExtension("MapServer", AllCapabilities = "GetInfo,FindFeatures,DemoCustomObject,DemoArrayOfCustomObjects", DefaultCapabilities = "GetInfo,DemoCustomObject,DemoArrayOfCustomObjects", Description = ".NET Find Near Features SOAP SOE Sample", DisplayName = ".NET Find Near Features Soap SOE", Properties = "", SupportsREST = false, SupportsSOAP = true, SOAPNamespaceURI = "http://examples.esri.com/schemas/NetFindNearFeaturesSoapSOE/1.0")]

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectInterceptorAttribute
member.summary: Use ServerObjectInterceptor attribute to annotate main SOI class. An Add-in package can have multiple ServerObjectInterceptor classes but it is not recommended.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectInterceptorAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: ServerObjectInterceptorAttribute constructor.
member.param: Type of the server object that this SOI was designed for. Example: 'MapServer'.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectInterceptorAttribute.DisplayName
member.summary: SOI display name that you will see in Manager or other admin client.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectInterceptorAttribute.Description
member.summary: SOI description.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectInterceptorAttribute.Properties
member.summary: SOI properties. List of name=value string pairs in a semicolon-separated list. name=value;name1=value1
member.example:
This example shows how to define SOI properties.
[ServerObjectExtension("MapServer", AllCapabilities = "", DefaultCapabilities = "", Description = ".NET Simple REST SOE With Properties", DisplayName = ".NET Simple REST SOE With Properties", Properties = "layerType=feature;returnFormat=json;maxNumFeatures=100;isEditable=false", HasManagerPropertiesConfigurationPane = false, SupportsREST = true, SupportsSOAP = false)] public class NetSimpleRESTSOEWithProperties : IServerObjectExtension, IObjectConstruct, IRESTRequestHandler

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectInterceptorAttribute.ServerObjectType
member.summary: Type of the server object that this SOE was designed for. Example: 'MapServer'.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerObjectInterceptorAttribute.HasManagerPropertiesConfigurationPane
member.summary: Set this flag to true if you have custom JS widget for the SOE properties pane in Manager. See ServerSimpleRESTSOEWithProperties SDK sample for details.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.Conversion
member.summary: Conversion class provides a set of static methods to convert a JSON string into a geometry and back..

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.Conversion.ToGeometry(System.String,ESRI.ArcGIS.Geometry.esriGeometryType)
member.summary: Converts a JSON string into an ArcObjects geometry.
member.param: The input JSON string.
The type of geometry to convert to.
member.returns: The ArcObject geometry instance or null if the conversion can't be performed.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.Conversion.ToSpatialReference(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a JSON string into an ArcObjects spatial reference

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.Conversion.ToGeometry(ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject,ESRI.ArcGIS.Geometry.esriGeometryType)
member.summary: Converts a JsonObject into an ArcObjects geometry.
member.param: The JsonObject to convert
The type of geometry to convert to.
member.returns: The ArcObject geometry or null if the conversion can't be performed.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.Conversion.ToJson(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geometry.IGeometry)
member.summary: Converts an ArcObjects geometry to a JSON UTF-8 string (and returns it an array of bytes).
member.param: The ArcObjects geometry to convert to JSON.
member.returns: The JSON string (UTF-8) as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.Conversion.ToJsonObject(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geometry.IGeometry)
member.summary: Converts an ArcObjects geometry to a JsonObject.
member.param: The ArcObjects geometry to convert.
member.returns: The resulting JsonObject.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.Conversion.ToJson(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geometry.IGeometry,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts an ArcObjects geometry to a JSON UTF-8 string (and returns it an array of bytes).
member.param: The ArcObjects geometry to convert to JSON.
Set to true to include spatial reference.
member.returns: The JSON string (UTF-8) as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.Conversion.ToJsonObject(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geometry.IGeometry,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts an ArcObjects geometry to a JsonObject.
member.param: The ArcObjects geometry to convert.
Set to true to include spatial reference.
member.returns: The resulting JsonObject.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.Conversion.ToJson(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IRecordSet)
member.summary: Converts an ArcObjects RecordSet to a JSON UTF-8 string (and returns it as an array of bytes). The geometries in each Record will be generalized and densified, before they are serialized to JSON.
member.param: The RecordSet to convert.
member.returns: The JSONN string (UTF-8) as an array of bytes.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject
member.summary: A class that represents a JSON object.

member.summary: Creates an empty JsonObject.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a JsonObject instance by deserializing a JSON string.
member.param: The json document to deserailize

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.Exists(System.String)
member.summary: Indicates if the a member with the given name exists in the JsonObject.
member.param: The member name to look for.
member.returns: True if the member is found, False if it isn't.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.IsNull(System.String)
member.summary: Indicates if the member with the given name is null. ArgumentOutOfRangeException will be thrown if the member doesn't exist in the JsonObject.
member.param: The name of the member to look for.
member.returns: True if the member is found, False if it isn't.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.AddObject(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds a object as a new member of the JsonObject. Use this method to add arrays of value types (e.g. double[]).
member.param: The name of the new member.
The object to be added.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.AddArray(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Adds an object array as a new member of the JsonObject.
member.param: The name of the new member.
The array to be added.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.AddJsonObject(System.String,ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject)
member.summary: Adds a JsonObject as a new member of the JsonObject.
member.param: The name of the new member.
The JsonObject to be added.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.AddDate(System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Adds a date as a new member of the JsonObject.
member.param: The name of the new member.
The date to be added.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.AddBoolean(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a boolean as a new member of the JsonObject.
member.param: The name of the new member.
The boolean value to be added.

member.summary: Adds a long as a new member of the JsonObject.

The long value to be added.

member.summary: Adds a double as a new member of the JsonObject.

The double value to be added.

member.summary: Adds a string as a new member of the JsonObject.

The string to be added.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.TryGetAsDate(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime}@)
member.summary: Returns the value of the member with the given name cast to a date.
member.param: The name of the member to return a date for.
The value of the member cast to a date or null.
member.returns: True if the member was found and its value can be cast to a date. False otherwise.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.TryGetArray(System.String,System.Object[]@)
member.summary: Returns the array for the member with the given name.
member.param: The name of the member that contains the array.
The array being returned or null.
member.returns: True if the member was found and its value is an array or null. False otherwise.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.TryGetObject(System.String,System.Object@)
member.summary: Returns the object value of the member with the given name.
member.param: The name of the member to return.
The object being returned or null.
member.returns: True if the member was found (even if its value is null). False otherwise.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.TryGetJsonObject(System.String,ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject@)
member.summary: Returns the JsonObject value of the member with the given name.
member.param: The name of the member to return.
The JsonObject being returned or null.
member.returns: True if the member was found (even if its value is null). False otherwise.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.TryGetAsBoolean(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean}@)
member.summary: Returns the value of the member with the given name cast to a bool.
member.param: The name of the member to return.
The value of the member cast to a bool or null.
member.returns: True if the member was found and can be cast to a bool. False otherwise.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.TryGetAsLong(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int64}@)
member.summary: Returns the value of the member with the given name cast to a long.
member.param: The name of the member to return.
The value of the member cast to a long or null.
member.returns: True if the member was found and can be cast to a long. False otherwise.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.TryGetAsDouble(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Double}@)
member.summary: Returns the value of the member with the specified name cast to a double.
member.param: The name of the member to return.
The value of the member cast to a double or null.
member.returns: True if the member was found and can be cast to a double. False otherwise.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.TryGetString(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Returns the string value of the member with the specified name.
member.param: The name of the member to return.
The string being returned. It may be null.
member.returns: True if the string-typed member was found (even if its value is null). False otherwise.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the member identified with the specified name.
member.param: The name of the member to delete.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.ToJson
member.summary: Writes the JsonObject to a JSON string.
member.returns: The JSON string.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the JsonObject members (Members are of type KeyValuePair<string, object>)
member.returns: IEnumerator

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.Count
member.summary: Returns the number of members the JsonObject has.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.JsonMemberEnumerator.MoveNext
member.summary: Advances the enumerator to the next element in the collection.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.JsonMemberEnumerator.Reset
member.summary: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.JsonObject.JsonMemberEnumerator.Current
member.summary: Gets the current element in the collection.

The output formats supported by the operation (e.g. "json").

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResponseProperties
member.summary: A class that helps generating the responseProperties string for a resource or operation.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResponseProperties.#ctor
member.summary: RestResponseProperties constructor. Sets content type to "text/plain;charset=utf-8" Sets data type to esriWebResponseDataType.esriWRDTPayload

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResponseProperties.ToString
member.summary: Generates a comma-separated list of properties to be returned to the http handler

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResponseProperties.ContentType
member.summary: Defines the value of the Content-Type http header. Default value is "text/plain;charset=utf-8" (valid for JSON)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResponseProperties.IsError
member.summary: Indicates if an error happened when processing a request. Some properties may not be written if that is the case.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResponseProperties.ResponseDataType
member.summary: Indicates if the response is sent embedded to the http handler (esriWRDTPayload, the default), or if a file is written in an output directory and the http handler should pick it up from there (esriWRDTFileToReturn)

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.OperationHandler
member.summary: A delegate type that defines the signature for REST operation handler functions.
member.param: A collection of the IDs of sub-resources in collection resources (e.g. The bound variable "LayersID" for a collection resource called "Layers" contains the ID of the sub-resource.)
A JsonObject instance with the input for the operation.
The requested output format, for example "json".
Well-known properties of the request.
Well-known properties for the response.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ResourceHandler
member.summary: A delegate type that defines the signature for REST resource handler functions.
member.param: A collection of the IDs of sub-resources in collection resources (e.g. The bound variable "LayersID" for a collection resource called "Layers" contains the ID of the sub-resource.)
The requested output format, for example "json".
Well-known properties for the request.
Well-known properties for the response.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.CheckCapabilityHandler
member.summary: A delegate type that defines capability checking callback.
member.param: Configuration capabilities passed with the request
Capabilities defined for the given resource/operation

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResource.name
member.summary: The name of the resource.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResource.isCollection
member.summary: Indicates if the resource is a collection.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResource.isDefaultCollection
member.summary: Indicates if the resource is a default collection. Default collection is a collection resource that can allows collection item access by a short URL. For example: if we have 'layers' resource, it's usually allows item access by this URL: <base url>/layers/<itemID> If you make it a default collection, you will be able to access it by the short URL: <base url>/<itemID> There can only be one default collection per set of siblings. For example: if we have two siblings <base url>/layers and <base url>/tables, only one can be a default collection.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.RestResource.RequiredCapability
member.summary: The capability required in a configuration for a resource to be callable.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerLogger
member.summary: A class used to add messages to the server's log.

member.summary: Logs a message.

The name of the method writing this message.
A unique identifier for the message.
The message to be written to the log.

member.summary: Logs a message.
member.param: The log level for the message.
The name of the method writing this message.
A unique identifier for the message.
The number of seconds elapsed.
The message to be written to the log.

member.summary: Logs the fact that a request has been received.
member.param: The name of the method being invoked.
The actual request. Its size will be logged.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.ServerLogger.LogResponse(System.String,System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Logs the fact that a response is being sent back to the client.
member.param: The name of the method.
The actual response. Its size will be logged.
The number of seconds it took to execute the method.

member.summary: Logs a message.
member.param: The name of the method writing this message.
The actual response. Its size will be logged.
The number of seconds elapsed.

Source request as IMessage

The function that handles messages

member.summary: Creates an instance of SoeRestImpl.

member.summary: REST post-filter handler definition.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestFilter

member.summary: The Operation property contains unique ID of the REST resource or operation.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestFilter.PostFilter
member.summary: The PostFilter delegate must be called after calling intercepted HandleRESTRequest. It modifies REST handler response.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode
member.summary: The RestHandlerOpCode class contains common REST request codes for the Map Server. The main benefit of using class instead of enum is to allow developers to add more opCodes in the derived types. See LayerAccess SOI source for an example of custom REST request codes.

member.name: F:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode.DefaultNoOp
member.summary: The DefaultNoOp REST request code must be used when REST request filtering code could not match any other RestHandlerOpCode to the REST request.

member.name: F:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode.Root
member.summary: The Root code matches the REST root resource.

member.name: F:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode.RootFind
member.summary: The RootFind code matches 'find' operation on REST root resource.

member.name: F:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode.RootIdentify
member.summary: The RootIdentify code matches 'identify' operation on REST root resource.

member.name: F:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode.RootExport
member.summary: The RootExport code matches 'export' operation on REST root resource.

member.name: F:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode.RootGenerateKml
member.summary: The RootGenerateKml code matches 'generateKml' operation on REST root resource.

member.name: F:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode.RootLayers
member.summary: The RootLayers code matches 'layers' sub-resource.

member.name: F:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode.RootLegend
member.summary: The RootLegend code matches 'legend' sub-resource.

member.name: F:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode.LayerRoot
member.summary: The LayerRoot code matches '/layers/{id}/ sub-resource.

member.name: F:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode.LayerGenerateRenderer
member.summary: The LayerGenerateRenderer code matches '/layers/{id}/generateRenderer' operation.

member.name: F:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode.LayerQuery
member.summary: The LayerQuery code matches 'layers/{id}/query' operation.

member.name: F:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode.LayerQueryRelatedRecords
member.summary: The LayerQueryRelatedRecords code matches '/layers/{id}/queryRelatedRecords' operation.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: The RestHandlerOpCode constructor is only used to declare static values above. It is protected so the derived classes can take advantage of it.
member.param: Enum-compatibility value to allow using this class in switch statements.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode.InternalValue
member.summary: The InternalValue property is used to emulate enum cast-to-int compatibility.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestSOIHelper
member.summary: The RestSOIHelper class is an utility class that helps to implement REST request handling in SOIs.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.SOIBase
member.summary: The SOIBase class is an utility class. Both RestSOIHelper and SoapSOIHelper derive from this class. It provides general support for the request interception. It is possible to use it directly, but we recommend to use the RestSOIHelper and SoapSOIHelper classes instead as they contain more useful utility methods.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.SOIBase.#ctor(ESRI.ArcGIS.Server.IServerObjectHelper)
member.summary: The SOIBase constructor. If used directly, should be called from the IServerObjectExtension.Init implementaiton.
member.param: IServerObjectHelper reference.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.SOIBase.GetRoleInformation(ESRI.ArcGIS.esriSystem.IServerUserInfo)
member.summary: Get allowed roles for the user making a request.
member.returns: set of roles

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.SOIBase.FindRequestHandlerDelegate``1
member.summary: The FindRequestHandlerDelegate is the most important method in SOIBase. It finds and returns the reference to the proper request handler based on the handler interface type.
member.typeparam: Type of the requested handler interface. Allowed interface types include IRESTRequestHandler, IWebRequestHandler, IRequestHandler2, IRequestHandler.
member.returns: Requested handler reference or null.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.SOIBase.ExtensionCache
member.summary: Cache of the active SOEs.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.SOIBase.ServerObjectHelper
member.summary: The ServerObjectHelper property provides access to the IServerObjectHelper reference. It is a read-only property.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.SOIBase.ServerEnvironment
member.summary: The ServerEnvironment property provides access to the IServerEnvironment2 reference. It is a read-only property. The most common usage of the ServerEnvironment property is to obtain user information from the ServerEnvironment.UserInfo.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestSOIHelper.#ctor(ESRI.ArcGIS.Server.IServerObjectHelper)
member.summary: The RestSOIHelper constructor accepts reference to IServerObjectHelper and should be called from the IServerObjectExtension.Init implementation.
member.param: Non-null reference to the IServerObjectHelper instance.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestSOIHelper.GetFilter(ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestHandlerOpCode)
member.summary: GetFilter returns filter set for the REST request or null if there is no filter set.
member.param: An unique identifier of the REST request specified in RestHandlerOpCode and/or derived types.
member.returns: Filter of the REST request or null if there is no filter set.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestSOIHelper.GetHandlerOpCode(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The GetHandlerOpCode method parses REST resource and operation name parameters and returns corresponding RestHandlerOpCode.
member.param: REST resource name passed to HandleRESTRequest
REST operation name passed to HandleRESTRequest
member.returns: Value of RestHandlerOpCode or RestHandlerOpCode.DefaultNoOp if resource+operation string pair does not match any pre-defined values of RestHandlerOpCode

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.RestSOIHelper.FilterMap
member.summary: Map of REST request filters for every REST request code.

member.summary: The SoapProxyMethodParameter class describes SOAP request parameter as name-typename pair.

member.summary: The name of the SOAP request parameter.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.SoapProxyMethodParameter.TypeName

An index of the requested parameter of the SOAP operation.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.SoapSOIHelper.GetObjectFromXMLSerializeData(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,ESRI.ArcGIS.esriSystem.IXMLSerializeData)
member.summary: Retrieves property of the IXmlSerializeData and converts it to managed object by value.
member.param: The index of the requested property.
Type namespace of the requested property. Only makes sense for the complex types.
SOAP type of the requested property.
Reference to source IXMLSerializeData interface.
member.returns: For simple types like xs:string it will return boxed value as an Object. For ArcGIS enumerations it will return enum value as a boxed string. For complex types it will return boxed object reference.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.SOESupport.SOI.SoapSOIHelper.AddObjectToXMLSerializeData(System.String,System.Object,System.String,ESRI.ArcGIS.esriSystem.IXMLSerializeData)
member.summary: Adds object to IXmlSerializeData property bag.
member.param: Property name.
Property value
SOAP type of the property.
Property data as Object.

member.param: Original IMessage. Must be not null.
